reviews.review: Funny characters, compelling story, full of plot twists to keep the viewer glued to the screen. It's an original idea and I would give it a 87% on the tomato-omilter. And Jailbreak is the best character.???????

The Emoji Movie:

Pros:
- None

Cons:
- Lazy Voice Acting

- Terrible Animation

- Horrible Script 

- Abysmal Humor

- Awful Plot

- Horrendous Directing

- Forgettable Characters

- Takes a lot from other kids movie (Inside Out, The Lego Movie, Wreck-It Ralph, etc.)

- How did Patrick Stewart go from Logan to this???

- Overused Product Placement

Overall Grade: F (0/10)
This was just so utterly horrible.
This movie was stupid and that’s a 1 hour and 18 minutes of my life that I can’t get back
Not as bad as critics say it is, but it is flawed. But, it has more good than bad moments in it like the Just Dance scene and the scene where the Bots are distracted by kitties on YouTube.
Unoriginal and cringe-worthy. Its recommended to stay away from this joke of a film at all cost and save your money.

this movie looks catastrophically bad for Sony. They need to do a major facelift on this movie or it will crash and burn like many other bad animated movies. Maybe they should release some more content since no one like the teaser but I don't think it gets much better after the teaser. Sony has not had a clean past but this could be on set to be their worst movie yet

Shocking, this movie sucks. I'm sooooooooo surprised. I thought the EMOJI MOVIE was going to be a classic. But it's boring, stupid and unfunny. This movie should take a million middle finger emojis! It's emojis!
????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????
BOOM! There's the emoji movie, give me the ??! To some this in one word:       meh
Quite Terrible, But It's Far From The Worst To Be Honest
As soon as I KNEW this movie was in production I knew it was going to majorly suck now that it's out there's only one word to describe it. HORRIBLE, just horrible.
